          <title>
            <string language="de">Zeitgenössische Stellungnahme zur Kriegsschuld</string>
            <string language="en">Contemporary statement on war debt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rapport contemporain sur la dette de guerre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Indicação contemporary no débito da guerra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzione contemporanea sul debito di guerra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύγχρονη δήλωση στο πολεμικό χρέος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Declaración contemporánea sobre deuda de la 
guerra</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Auszug aus einer Einordnung der Kriegsursachen durch den Geschichtsprofessors Erich Brandenburg 1925. Fragen zum Text.</string>
            <string language="en">Excerpt from a classification of the causes of war written by history professor Erich Brandenburg in 1925. Questions on the text.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">1. Weltkrieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Krieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Kriegsursache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">1. World war</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">War</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">A war cause</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Extrait d'une classification des causes de la 
guerre écrites par professeur Erich Brandenburg d'histoire en 1925. 
Questions sur le texte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Excerpt de uma classificação das causas da 
guerra escritas pelo professor Erich Brandenburg do history em 1925. 
Perguntas no texto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Brano da una classificazione delle cause della 
guerra scritte dal professor Erich Brandenburg di storia in 1925. 
Domande sul testo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόσπασμα από μια ταξινόμηση τις αιτίες του πολέμου 
που γράφονται από την ιστορία τον καθηγητή Erich Βραδεμβούργο 
σε 1925, ερωτήσεις στο κείμενο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Extracto de una clasificación de las causas de 
la guerra escritas por profesor Erich Brandenburg de la historia en 
1925. Preguntas sobre el texto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">1. Guerre mondiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guerre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une cause de guerre</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">1. Guerra de mundo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guerra</string>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guerra</string>

          <keyword>
